thread.title: Our leader is still alive, Boko Haram says in new video
thread.title_full: Our leader is still alive, Boko Haram says in new video | News24

author: news24.com
title: Our leader is still alive, Boko Haram says in new video
text:
Lagos - Boko Haram said in a new video on Wednesday that its elusive leader Abubakar Shekau was alive and still in charge of the Nigeria-based Islamist group whose six-year insurgency has killed thousands.
"Our leader, Abubakar Shekau is alive and remains our leader," declared a gun-wielding man surrounded by dozens of fighters in the 17-minute video in Arabic and Hausa that was posted on social media.
"Our allegiance remains with (Abu Bakr) al-Baghadadi," added the man who has appeared in previous Boko Haram videos, referring to the leader of the Islamic State group that has seized large swathes of Syria and Iraq.
In March Shekau proclaimed Boko Haram's allegiance to ISIS.
